SEARCH
Package model

Class Bear

java.lang.Object
model.Bear
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Co, Po, To
public abstract class Bear extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a Bear. Contains common fields and methods used by all bear types.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • feed

      public void feed(int amount)
      Feed the bear to increase hunger (fullness).
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to feed

    • sleep

      public void sleep(int amount)
      Let the bear sleep to restore sleep stat.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of sleep recovery

    • play

      public void play(int amount)
      Play with the bear to increase happiness.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of fun to add

    • heal

      public void heal(int amount)
      Heal the bear to restore health.
      Parameters:
      amount - the healing amount

    • updateStats

      public abstract void updateStats()
      Abstract method to update the bear's stats over time. Must be implemented by each subclass with its unique behavior.

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Check if the bear is dead (health is at or below the minimum).
      Returns:
      true if dead, false otherwise.

    • isAngry

      public boolean isAngry()
      Check if the bear is angry (happiness is less than or equal to 25% of max).
      Returns:
      true if angry, false otherwise.

    • isHungry

      public boolean isHungry()
      Check if the bear is very hungry (hunger is less than or equal to 25% of max).
      Returns:
      true if hungry, false otherwise.

    • isTired

      public boolean isTired()
      Check if the bear is tired (sleep is less than or equal to 25% of max).
      Returns:
      true if tired, false otherwise.

      public int getHappiness()
      Returns how happy the bear currently is.
      Returns:
      the current happiness level of the bear.

    • getHungerPercent

      public double getHungerPercent()
      Calculates the bear's current hunger level as a percentage of max.
      Returns:
      the hunger percentage (0.0 to 1.0).

    • getHealthPercent

      public double getHealthPercent()
      Calculates the bear's current health level as a percentage of the max.
      Returns:
      the health level as a value between 0.0 and 1.0

    • getSleepPercent

      public double getSleepPercent()
      Calculates the bear's current sleep level as a percentage of the max.
      Returns:
      the sleep level as a value between 0.0 and 1.0

    • getHappinessPercent

      public double getHappinessPercent()
      Calculates the bear's current happiness level as a percentage of the max.
      Returns:
      the happiness level as a value between 0.0 and 1.0

    • getLabel

      public abstract String getLabel()
      Abstract method to get the display label for the bear. Subclasses should return a string like "Po (Panda)".
      Returns:
      the display label for the bear.

    • revive

      public void revive()
      Revive the bear by restoring all stats to max level Used for testing or game reset purposes
